elements.name: Frage 1
elements.title: Using rules 2 and 3 from the Observer article, explain when and how you can return an item that has already been purchased. Use the following terms: original packaging, receipt, note.
elements.correctAnswer: You can return a purchased item if it is still 	unused and in its original packaging, the sales staff have made a note on the receipt about the right to exchange and the deadline mentioned there has been met.

elements.name: Frage 2
elements.title: Read point 6 on the right to return Zalando items (you will find the link outside the task). Explain the connection to rule 2.
elements.correctAnswer: The terms and conditions for orders via Zalando replace rule 2 (cash register receipt) because I have to agree to them before my online purchase.

elements.name: panel2
elements.title: A salesperson approaches you unexpectedly at the station and persuades you to take out a new cell phone subscription. Cost: CHF 360 per year (can only be canceled after one year). When you get home, you realize that you don't want this subscription at all.

elements.name: Frage 3
elements.title: Check whether all the requirements of rule 4 are met by noting one if-element and the corresponding facts.
elements.placeHolder: Beispiel: Wenn-Element: Keine Versicherung Sachverhaltselement: Ja, Handy-Abo ist kein Versicherungsvertrag.
elements.correctAnswer:
If element: Customer's performance > CHF 100
If element: Yes, CHF 360 > CHF 100!

If element: Private use of the goods or DL
If element: Yes, no business cell phone!

If element: Contract negotiations must not have been requested.
Subject: Yes, I did not want this, I was simply approached

When element: Contract concluded at home, at work, on the phone, in public, on an excursion.
Subject: Yes, station concourse = in public

elements.name: Frage 7
elements.title: Write down your conclusion in an if-then sentence:

elements.name: panel3
elements.title: The seller advertises a Gucci handbag as partially hand-sewn, genuine and valuable. It later turns out that the handbag is a fake. Complete the sentences in a meaningful way:

elements.name: Frage 8
elements.title: The instrument shows us that we can safely withdraw from the contract here because ...
elements.correctAnswer: The instrument shows us that we can safely withdraw from the contract here because the buyer believed he was buying a genuine Gucci handbag. The value of a counterfeit is considerably lower.

elements.name: Frage 9
elements.title: The rule ... may also apply here because ...
elements.correctAnswer: Rule 7 may also apply here because the seller is deceiving the other party. Whether this is intentional is likely, but not certain.
